cmp: 本 (roots or stems of plants/origin/source/this/the current/root/foundation/basis/(a measure word))
mng: body, form, style, system, substance, to experience, aspect (linguistics)

exm.mng: simplified form of Chinese characters, as opposed to traditional form 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3]
the body, one's health, in person
whole entity, entire body, synthesis, as a whole (situation, construction, team etc), global, macrocosm, integral, holistic, whole
